home.title: SSMD computing for the Web
home.tagline: a cluster control toolkit for computing on distributed web nodes.
home.description: Node::Blocks utilizes modern Web technologies to harvest the power of a truly distributed Internet that we all live in.

features.description: Our platform is a friendly, free to use high-performance computing toolkit built for the modern Web.

modern.title: Modern
modern.description:
Some of the technologies that we use:
  • HTML5 web workers
  • Node.js v9

free.title: Free to use
free.description: Node::Blocks is free to use for 1 concurrent job with up to 15 private users (runners).

friendly.title: Friendly
friendly.description: A computing job can literally be started with a single push of a button.

pricing.description: Node::Blocks is free to use for 1 concurrent job with up to 15 private users (runners).

basic.title: Basic
basic.description:
As a Basic user, you get:
  • 1 concurrent job
  • Up to 15 private users in a project
  • 15+ predefined algorithms

premium.title: Premium
premium.description:
As a Premium user, you get:
  • 5 concurrent jobs
  • Unlimited users in a project
  • 50+ predefined algorithms
  • Public jobs

invalid.email: This does not look like an email
